summary: A survivor of the Great Siege of Rochester Castle fights to save his clan from Celtic raiders. A sequel to the 2011 film, "Ironclad."
cast: Michelle Fairley|Roxanne McKee|David Rintoul|Tom Austen|Tom Rhys Harries|Rosie Day|Danny Webb|Predrag Bjelac|David Caves|Andy Beckwith|Dragana Atlija|Ana Sakic|Zorana Becic|Ljubomir Bulajic|Ivana Nikolic|Marko Jocic|Dusanka Stojanovic|Twinnie Lee Moore|Bojan Lazarov|Igor Turcinovic|Boris Pingovic|Radoje Jelic|Vesna Pastrovic|Goran Markovic|Jeff Babb|Goce Balkovic
title: Templario II: Batalla por la sangre
